title: kSIra sAgara shAyi
sahitya:
kSIra sAgara shAyi nin tiruvaDi bhajanamE jIvAdhAram


anupallavi

  shrI ramai maNavALa dayAkarA dinam unai nambina engaLai kAttaruL


caraNam    unadaruL inriyOr aNuvum ashaiyumO ulagin carAcara uyirgaLuk-kellAm
unadaruL inri inbamum uNDO O jagannAthA dIna sharaNyanE
